rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 14 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 6:50 PM, 15 June 2025(Sunday)



Heavy to intense rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Zambales, Bataan, Batangas, Rizal, Quezon and Nueva Ecija within the next 2 hours.



Intense to torrential rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Pampanga(Sasmuan, Macabebe, Masantol), Bulacan(Hagonoy, Calumpit), Metro Manila(Las Pinas, Muntinlupa), Cavite(Imus, Bacoor), Laguna(Calamba, Los Banos, Bay) and Tarlac(Victoria, Pura, Gerona, Santa Ignacia, Mayantoc, San Jose, Tarlac City, La Paz) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
